name: Shelly Defenders ALPHA
description:
This is a tower defense game, the towers are the shelly (snails) and the enemies are variated.

The game is still in development, so is normal if you find some bugs, but don`t worry, i'll fix them in every upload and add new content

some tips:

Press R to restart

Press T to open a textbox

Write Golem to summon a boss

Write Dorado to get 1000000

Bow shelly is deployed in cliffs (yellow grass)
